model_answer: The visual comparison shown on screen is a split-screen of the same street with CUT on the left and Ours on the right, showing lower detail on the left and higher realism on the right. (Option A)

Answer: C: G-buffer features and Enhanced image
The diagram on screen likely depicts the output of the convolutional network mentioned in the speech. The G-buffer is used to store various per-pixel attributes such as depth, normal, and color. These attributes are combined to create a more realistic image by enhancing the photorealism of the game's graphics.
